author: Special Correspondent
text:
Tamil Nadu Congress Committee (TNCC) president E.V.K.S. Elangovan has exuded confidence that Desiya Murpokku Dravida Kazhagam (DMDK), headed by Vijayakant, would join the DMK-led front to fight the coming Assembly elections.

‘To strengthen the front’

Asserting that the DMK-Congress combine would register a massive victory in the elections, he said the DMDK should join the alliance to strengthen the front.

“I once again appeal to the DMDK to join the DMK-led front and I am confident it will join us,” Mr. Elangovan told reporters here on Friday. The Congress leader, who was here on a private visit, said all those who believed in secularism could join the DMK-led front.

‘I once again appeal to the DMDK to join the DMK-led front and I am confident it will

join us’
title: Elangovan confident of Vijayakant joining DMK-led front
